title: Paladin
content:
nse (Bonus Action) Channel Oath Charges (Class Feature) Pick a Paladin Oath (Oath of the Ancients, Oath of Devotion, Oath of Vengeance, Oath of the Crown. Note that Oathbreaker are not picked during level up, instead, take any action that breaks your Oath will summon the Oathbreaker Knight. )

Level 1 Paladin Spellcasting (Class Feature) Divine Smite (Action) Choose a Fighting Style (Defence, Duelling, Great Weapon Fighting or Protection) (Class Feature)
